page.title: 18CUSTOMS AND EXCISE
page.content:
It is illegal to import animals into the country therefore they must be put into quarantine to ensure that no harmful diseases eg.rabies,are bought into the country.
The official staff numbers in the Customs and Excise Office in March 1984 are as follows:-
STAFF IN THE DISTRICT 25,309 STAFF IN DISTRICT COLLECTIONS 1,540 STAFF IN DOVER COLLECTIONS 1,000 UNIFORMED STAFF IN DOVER 350
In December 1984 figures for traffic passing through Dover Docks are:-
PASSENGERS 8,916,712 CARS 361,000 COACHES 65,000
